summary: This script executes unloadram.sh, creates a directory fs/workdir, sets its permissions to 777, and mounts a tmpfs filesystem named myramdisk_workdir with 10M size on fs/workdir directory.

details.comment: This script executes unloadram.sh, creates a directory fs/workdir, sets its permissions to 777, and mounts a tmpfs filesystem named myramdisk_workdir with 10M size on fs/workdir directory.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
./unloadram.sh
#sudo mkdir ramdisk
sudo mkdir fs/workdir
sudo chmod 777 fs/workdir
sudo mount -t tmpfs -o size=10m myramdisk_workdir fs/workdir
